GUI

Class DirectoryViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI.DirectoryViewer

  • public class DirectoryViewer
extends java.lang.Object
    Directory view - displays a directory as a tree view on GUI. Wav files in the directory can be added to the editor. Files may be dragged into the directory or deleted from it and the directory may be changed Selected files may be previews using the directory player - (Alternative audio player, uses clips)

      • getNodesForDirectory

        public javafx.scene.control.TreeItem<java.io.File> getNodesForDirectory(java.io.File directory)
        Creates a tree structure of a users directories from a given root. It will filter out any file type that is not ".wav" Adds event handlers to the wav files so that they can be previewed.
        Parameters:
        directory -
        Returns:
        root
